Sentencas: Therefore, LSCrF is a good catalyst for methane-reforming and oxidation.

Sentencas: LSCrF is a methane complete oxidation catalyst when close to oxygen stoichiometric and a methane partial oxidation catalyst when the oxygen vacancy content increases.

Sentencas: The anode polarization resistances in wet 5% H-2/Ar and wet H-2 are about 1.79 and 1.15 Omega cm(2), respectively, at 850 degreesC.
